name: Get Off Our Lands
description:
This was our first game made in Godot, for university purposes only.

It's 1970, the USA and The Soviet Union are fighting for lands to colonize the Moon. Join the war in this Real Time Strategy Game now!

How to Play:

Click the icons to create soldiers, consuming food in the process.

Conquering a Neutral Command Post gives you more food every 5 seconds.

Get gold by killing enemies.

You can also build robots by spending gold.

Destroy the Enemy Command Post to win.

Have Fun!

The game has some bugs and it's quite unbalanced, give us your feedback  and bug reports in the comments below, thank you for playing!!

Developers:

Programmer - Anderson Milioli

Artist and Designer- Andrei Souza
